dialogueContent.words: <color=#ffcc00>TARGET DETECTED ON QUADRANT, DROPPING MISSION LANCE ON POSITION.</color>
<color=#3366ff>REQUIREMENTS FOR MISSION: SEARCH - DESTROY - EXTRACT. AVOID FURTHER ACTION IF POSSIBLE</color>
I was worried Commander, we lost contact with your group as soon as you entered the dropship. its good nothing bad happened.
<color=#e20000>MISSION FAILURE, PARAMETERS NOT MET, ENDING TRANSMISSION.</color>
<color=#ffcc00>SITUATION UPDATED: TARGET ENCOUNTERED - NEUTRALIZE THE UNIT.</color>
<color=#ffcc00>SITUATION UPDATED: SEISMIC SENSORS DETECTING NEW TARGETS. PRIORITY NOT ALTERED.</color> <mark=#666666>CONTINUE;</mark>
<color=#ff9933>SITUATION UPDATED: TARGET IS RETREATING, EXTERMINATE THE TARGET BEFORE FAILURE.</color>

longDescription: We received this suspicious transmission on the late hours of the night Commander. The decrypted message is incomplete and somehow the sender's name is fake, even HPG ID which was send doesn't exist. We don't know anything about what we are gonna find. [WARNING: HARD]

objectiveList.description: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the primary target.
objectiveList.title: Destroy Escort Units

objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.
objectiveList.title: SEARCH AND DESTROY

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance
objectiveList.title: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone

objectiveList.description: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.
objectiveList.title: Stop the Prototype from Escaping

objectiveList.description: Armor of the Target is breached.
objectiveList.title: Armor Breached

shortDescription: Incoming transmission from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}: *static* Do this for favor for us Co-*static*-der, and we will promise big rewards for the future *static*. We will also take control of what you *static* in this mission. Don't expect negotiations on this.
